document.docAuthor: Alipanah, Helen, Yakovlev, Roman, Falsafi, Hossein, Witt, Thomas & Saldaitis, Aidas

subSubSection.paragraph:
Cossus fereydun Grum-Grshimailo, 1895
, Hor. Soc. Ent. Ross. 29 (1/2): 291–292.

LT: Persia septentr. (Demavend) [prov. Tehran , Demavend, N. Iran ]. Type material ( holotype ) in ZISP.
=
Holcocerus (? Cossus ) firdusi Wagner, 1937
, Zeitschr. Ost. Ent.-Ver. 22: 23.

LT: Persia S., Elburs , Demavend , Tarsee [ Iran ]. Type material ( holotype ) in NMW
.

=
Cossus osthelderi Daniel, 1932b
, Mitt. Münch. Ent. Ges. 22: 95.
LT: Nord-Amanus, Dül-Dül Dagh beim Dorf School [ Turkey ]. Type material: holotype (by) in MWM .

, male. E)
Dyspessacossus fereidun (Grum-Grshimailo)
, male. F)
D. funkei (Röber)
, male (scale bar= 10.0 mm).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Distribution in Iran .
N, NW, W, and SW Iran ( Fig. 31D ).

Remarks. This species is currently represented by three subspecies namely,
Dyspessacossus fereidun fereidun ( Grum-Grshimailo, 1895 )
,
D. fereidun ahmadi
Wiltshire, 1957 and
D. fereidun osthelderi (Daniel, 1932)
which according to
Yakovlev (2011a)
, the latter subspecies is distributed in Iran . However, the taxonomic status of these subspecies needs further investigation.
